name: MARIO MADNESS
description:
Mario Madness is a gory top down shooter mario game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 50 by two crazy brothers : Noa and Liam Calice !

Rules : MOVE with the ARROW KEYS and SHOOT + AIM with the MOUSE ! KILL THOSE PESKY GOOMBAS ! 

For MORE on BLACKTHORNPROD check out our YOUTUBE CHANNEL : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g/videos?view_as=subscrib...

You can also follow BTP on TWITTER : https://twitter.com/NoaCalice

And join the BTP DISCORD SERVER : https://discord.gg/EfcNqgA
